name: Flying on Lynx Air's Final Flight
description:
In the early morning hours on Monday, February 26th, Calgary-based Lynx Air sadly ceased operations.

The news came just a few days prior on February 22nd, when the airline revealed that they had filed for creditor protection, with operations slowly winding down over the weekend.

Up until Sunday the 25th, you could still book some last minute tickets, and in the name of documenting history and giving the hundreds of talented individuals at Lynx Air the send-off they deserve, I grabbed a seat on the last YVR-YYC flight.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Lynx Air (DAT/Y9)
Aircraft: Boeing 737-8 MAX (B38M)
Flight Number: Y9107
Seat: 6F
Livery: Basic Norwegian c/s
Engines: 2x CFM LEAP-1B
Registration: C-FULJ
Route: Vancouver (YVR) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: DAUNTLESS 107
Runway used: 26L (YVR) - 35L (YYC)
Date filmed: February 2024
